ComicInfo.Title: Jurassic Pink
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Inspector is back! We welcome everyone's favorite klutzy constable back with new adventures and hilarious escapades! And The Pink Panther takes center stage in brand new sidesplitting tales. Get more pink for your green in every issue of The Pink Panther!
Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Adrian Ropp | 1 | Var | Classic Variant Cover | S.L. Gallant | 2 | RI | 1:3 Retro Retailer Incentive Cover | Animation Art | 3 | Sub | Pink Hijinks Variant Cover | Bill Galvan | 4 |
1) The Pink Panther - Jurassic Pink - 7 pages
2) Classic Inspector - Case of the Cat Burgler - 5 pages (reprint from The Pink Panther #50 - Pink Contestant)
3) The Pink Panther - Big City Pink - 8 pages
4) Ant and the Aardvark - Rock Bottom - 1 page
5) Classic Pink Panther - Pink Volunteer - 6 pages (reprint from The Pink Panther #52)
Bill Galvan Sketch Gallery - 3 pages
Pink Panther - Trick Or Pink Halloween Special - 1 page In-house ad
Note: Sergeant Deux Deux is on the cover but not in the issue.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-05 20:36:57. [CVDB546488]

ComicInfo.Inker: Adrian Ropp, Pete Alvarado, Warren Tufts, Adrian Ropp, Pete Alvarado, Warren Tufts
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Adrian Ropp, Bill Galvan, S.L. Gallant
ComicInfo.Characters: Inspector, Little Man, Pink Panther, Sergeant Deux Deux, The Aardvark, The Ant, The Commissioner
